briefdescription.para: Audio instances are owned by FormRepresentation There is zero to many Audio instances per FormRepresentation.
Pointers to an existing Speaker There is zero to many pointers per FormRepresentation instance.

detaileddescription.para:
FormRepresentation instances are owned by Form.
A FormRepresentation instance.

simplesect.para: FormRepresentation private attribute '__speaker', a Python list of Speaker instances.

parameterdescription.para: Type of variant, in range 'type_variant_range' defined in 'common/range.py'.
If this argument is given, get comment only if written in this language.

briefdescription.para: "Form Representation is a class representing one variant orthography of a Form." (LMF)
